title: Extra Bonus RP headed your way for a limited time!

replies.body: i wont buy RP until they stop using the exchange rate to rip off OCE players. RITO please dont change the price when the US dollar drops, then hold prices when it rises. its really scummy when you guys are taking $1.25B in revenue.
Deleted. Stay away from these BS scams dudes. - Riot Gehirn
**[Who needs 8250RP instantly?!](https://www.facebook.com/952265458117476/videos/1067334036610617/)**
Fake,Fake,Fake and fake :) No such thing as "free rp' Rofl kids these days trying to scam

people claiming free RP if u do a few steps (however it's sometimes skins). they tend to attempt to mimic the official league site with this garbage

Hi there, 
it says that there will be extra bonus for PREPAID rp cards but it only states the $10 card and $25 card. My question is if there will be extra bonus rp for $50 PREPAID rp card? 
Please help!
It will be the same as $50 from the client would be, so 6600 RP. As you can see, the RP from the $10 card is the same as $10 from the client.
Logged in for upvote... exactly as I was thinking, and considering the bonus escalates according to the associated amount, this is quite the concern.
How much do I get if I buy a $50 card then? {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} Can someone tell me if there is a bonus for it or not? I can't seem to find it :<
seeing as the pre paid card for $10 is the same as credit i think it'll be 6600 RP
Thank you <3 ^^
this  is not the real way.60rp for what we dont care it.and its really useless.if you guyz can give 1350 rp for 10$.
I haven't bought RP Since they changed the amount and price of RP, guess I'm getting RP again
Same. But I have spent wayyyyyyyy too much on this game I think it best for me to continue to avoid buying RP...

I don't even get why they had to change the price rate, sure ours is worth less, but we also get paid less;

eg: Maccas in america pays $14.70us per hour, while Maccas in Australia pays $11.90au per hour, so our pay and our rp is less, it was fine as it was before change.

"paid less" is entirely based on where you work. There are tons of places that will pay you more here than in America. In general, salaries in Australia are higher than they are in America. Reducing how much AUD it would cost to get RP is entirely objectively based on the currency you are using to purchase it, not something arbitrary like "I work here, but this place has shit pay, so I should get more RP".

Yeah basically what he said. I work at woolies as a casual for more than $25 an hour and a similar job in the US pays around  $15 an hour. Plus Riot's revenue is in USD so whatever they make in other regions needs to be comparable. Also it keeps it fair to a certain extent.
